title: Koibito no Nedan
sinopse:
Several stories :

1. Lover's Price (Koibito no Nedan) (2 chapters)

When Makino is told to persue the rich son of a sheik for a buisness deal with his company he puts his whole heart into it. Determined to show him a good time and the best of Japan he's doublyshocked that his guest expects extra services from him! Whats a poor buisness man to do with a smitten prince?
